body: I just wanted to say thank you to all of the MapDevs for creating our Amazing, Beautiful new hub. All the exploring is great and fun, and the parkour is astounding too. And, just the general aesthetics are great, and I know it took a while to make, so thank you. Also, you listened to the community, adding the parkour and exploring which were the two main things we wanted in Gill's post asking what we would like to see in the new hub, and that's what makes it all the more special for us.

title: Thank you to the MapDevs!

replies.body: You're welcome! We tried our best to make the most of it, and to make it enjoyable for you. I am glad you like it! :)
replies.body_tagged: You're welcome! We tried our best to make the most of it, and to make it enjoyable for you. I am glad you like it! :)

replies.body: Thank you very much :} That's really kind of you!
